column5: Our place is close to art and culture, great views, restaurants, and dining. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the outdoors space, the comfy bed, and the neighborhood.   We are in the heart of the hill country, within a few miles of Deep Eddy Vodka, Treaty Oak, numerous wineries and breweries and gorgeous hill country scenery. This is the perfect place to base your adventure from!! Located 20 minutes to the heart of Austin and in the middle of all the hill country has to offer.
column8: Spacious and Gorgeous Hill Country casita
